about_the_game:
Welcome to Sensual Saga City!

Enter this open world full of fun, lust and mystery and discover what you can do here; meet girls and date them, attend parties, have lots of sex and increase your skills as a lover. Let yourself be seduced by this world and all it has to offer!

Features

·Meet the girls of Sensual Saga and their story, dare to be part of it!
·Make friends and some rivals... In love anything goes!
·Experience different stories in the surroundings of a university campus in the centre of a city.
·Help solve a mystery. Who is the hooded man stealing compromising photos of students?
·Work hard, conquer the heart of the girls and have intense sex moments with them.
·Who knows, maybe you'll meet the girl of your dreams and fall in love...

Play the story of Jasper, a university student who discovers that the girl of his dreams will change universities at the end of the summer. Will you coincide at the same parties? Will you arrive in time to seduce her? Who will you meet along the way? Who knows, you might even get involved in some mystery!

content_descriptors.notes:
Sensual Saga is an erotic sexual game with a lot of fun and very explicit sex scenes. Its story or stories always take place in and around a university campus and all the people involved in the sexual acts are always of legal age. 

The game may contain scenes or references to the use of alcohol and tobacco. 

The game, depending on the player's decisions, may lead to minor violence (e.g. a fight between two men at a beach party), but there will never be any sexual assault and all relationships are fully consensual. 

The game is developed by an etherogeneous team of men and women and the only aim is to make it a fun and exciting experience.
